Question: Dongguan Habotest Instrument Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Habotest Instrument Technology Co.,Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Automatic Digital Multimeter
- Digital Clamp Meter
- Plug Socket Tester
- Digital Infrared Thermometer
- Pen Type Voltage Tester
- Digital Insulation Tester
- Earth Resistance Tester
- RCD LOOP Tester
- Air Quality Detector
- Digital Thermo Hygrometer
- Digital Lux Meters
- Digital Sound Level Meters
- Digital Anemometer

Dongguan Habotest Instrument Technology Co.,Ltd offers a range of innovative measuring products including digital multimeters, clamp meters, plug socket testers, and environmental detectors. With over 20 years of R&D, the company has standardized management and quality systems, obtaining ISO9001-2008 and ISO/TS16949 certifications. Their products are widely used in industrial electronic installation, maintenance services, DIY, and household needs. They also provide OEM/ODM services and have an annual revenue of 16-20 million USD with 250-300 employees.
Summary_cn:
东莞市哈博特仪器技术有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点：

-自动数字万用表
- 数字钳形电流表
- 插座测试仪
-数字红外测温仪
- 笔型电压测试仪
- 数字绝缘电阻测量仪
-接地电阻测量仪
- RCD环路测试仪
- 空气质量监测仪
- 数字温湿度计
- 数字光照度计
- 数字声级计
- 数字风速计

东莞市哈博特仪器技术有限公司提供一系列创新的测量产品，包括数字多用表、夹形电流表、插座测试仪和环境检测仪。公司具有20多年的研发经验，拥有标准化的管理和质量体系，获得了ISO9001-2008和ISO/TS16949认证。他们的产品广泛应用于工业电子安装、维修服务、DIY以及家庭需求。他们还提供OEM/ODM服务，并拥有年收入1600-2000万美元，员工250-300人。
